title: Adventure playgrounds
creator_credit: Stanley Schofield and National Playing Fields Association
brief_description: An adventure playground can be created by children themselves, out of scrap materials on a piece of wasteland. It can provide an outlet for energy, a means for building self-confidence, and reducing the juvenile delinquency rate. Discusses the importance of the play leader.
